/* USE : storeCloseMapper.getStoreCloseList */
SELECT cal.YMD AS CLOSE_MONTH , SUBSTR(cal.YMD, 5, 6) || ' 월' AS CLOSE_MONTH_NM , TO_CHAR( TRUNC(LAST_DAY(cal.YMD||'01')),'DD') AS DATE_CNT , SUM(DECODE(tphsc.ORDER_CLOSE_FG, 'Y', 1, 0)) AS CLOSE_DATE_CNT FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_CLOSE tphsc , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{closeMonth}, 'YYYYMM'), 'YYYY')||'0101', LEVEL-1), 'MM'), 'YYYYMM') YMD FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) cal WHERE tphsc.CLOSE_DATE(+) LIKE cal.YMD||'%' AND tphsc.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) = #{hqOfficeCd} GROUP BY cal.YMD ORDER BY cal.YMD

/* USE : storeCloseMapper.getStoreCloseDtlList */
SELECT cal.DATE1 AS CLOSE_DATE , SUBSTR(cal.DATE1,5,8) AS CLOSE_DATE_NM , NVL(tphsc.ORDER_CLOSE_FG, 'N') AS ORDER_CLOSE_FG , tphsc.ORDER_CLOSE_DT , (SELECT them.EMP_NM FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE them WHERE tphsc.ORDER_CLOSE_ID = them.USER_ID) AS ORDER_CLOSE_NM FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_CLOSE tphsc , ( SELECT (#{closeMonth} || LPAD(LEVEL, 2, '0')) DATE1 FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT TO_CHAR( TRUNC(LAST_DAY(#{closeMonth}||'01')),'DD') FROM DUAL) ) cal WHERE tphsc.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tphsc.CLOSE_DATE (+) = cal.DATE1 ORDER BY cal.DATE1
